I have been wearing them ever sense, only taking them out to clean and sanitize and have had no irritation!  If I couldn't find a earing that didn't irritate my ear I would have had to let it close up (goodbye my $$).  Very pretty, keeps its shine, and is perfect for sensitive ears.

5 stars for the earrings. I actually bought these to replace a different pair where the maker mounted the posts on a triangle point, so the tip often started to sink into the piercing hole. Disappointed in the packaging, however. 1 star for packaging. One loose post inside a plastic baggie, inside another plastic baggie with the other loose post.
